original_text: The Levites who were musicians stood on the east side of the altar. They were Asaph, Heman, Jeduthun and their sons and their relatives. They wore clothes made of linen. They made music with cymbals, harps and lyres. There were also 120 priests who made music with trumpets.
korean_text: 노래하는 레위 사람 아삽과 헤만과 여두둔과 그의 아들들과 형제들이 다 세마포를 입고 제단 동쪽에 서서 제금과 비파와 수금을 잡고 또 나팔 부는 제사장 백이십 명이 함께 서 있다가

sentences.original_text: stood on the east side of the altar
and their sons and their relatives
They wore clothes made of linen
They made music with cymbals, harps and lyres
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 심벌즈, 하프와 리라로 음악을 연주했습니다
